attributes.action: provide better funding for public libraries, and help create a truly 21st century library service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Public Libraries provide a wide range of free and useful services to their local communities.  They are, however, under funded, poorly supported and lacking in proper representation at a national level.  

They have the potential to do so much, but are suffering from years of neglect.  The government should recognise this and should also recognise that local government will not provide a solution to these problems while public library funding can ebused elsewhere.  

There should be proper funding for libraries at a national level, and a proper drive towards creating a truly modern service which can be of use to all.
